sections.summary: dedicated security specialist professionalâ that possess and excutes a broad knowledge of division processes to include personnel security, information security, physical security and industrial security.â personable leader who comfortably interacts with people from diverse cultures and backgrounds. highlights joint personnel security asset protection professional certification (sappc) adjudication system security fundamentals professional certification (sfpc) e-qipâ cleared for top secret information and granted access to sensitive compartmented information based on a single microsoft office scope background inestigaton. (open ppr, 204 12 12) accomplishments deployed in support of a joint special operations task force in the centcom area of responsibility (aor). provided full-spectrum security support to include personnel security, information security, physical security and industrial security. worked with joint personnel from all services, as well as other government agencies.
